meanings.definition: The first appearance of light in the sky before sunrise.
meanings.sent1: The dawns brought a gentle glow to the horizon.
meanings.sent2: The dawns are always so peaceful and beautiful.
meanings.sent3: As the dawns broke, the birds began their morning songs.
meanings.sent4: The dawns painted the sky with hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the dawns of my childhood by the lake.

meanings.definition: To begin to grow light in the morning.
meanings.sent1: The sky dawns slowly, revealing the day ahead.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, the world dawns anew with possibilities.
meanings.sent3: The sleepy town dawns to life as the sun rises.
meanings.sent4: Hope dawns with the first light of the morning.
meanings.sent5: The day dawns with a promise of adventure and joy.

meanings.definition: To begin to be perceived or understood.
meanings.sent1: Understanding dawns on her face as she solves the puzzle.
meanings.sent2: It dawns on me that I left my keys at home.
meanings.sent3: Realization dawns slowly, like a light bulb flickering to life.
meanings.sent4: The truth dawns on him like a sudden burst of sunlight.
meanings.sent5: Clarity dawns as the pieces of the mystery fall into place.
